alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 7:16AM MST until January 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations of 0.10 to 0.20 inches. * WHERE...Marias Pass, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Polebridge, Bad Rock Canyon, and Essex. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to ice. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
